TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CompiledQuery extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides for compilation and caching of queries for reuse.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Conceptually this class contains a single method (`Compile`) with several overloads. You call the <xref:System.Data.Linq.CompiledQuery.Compile%2A> method to create a new delegate to represent the compiled query.
> [!NOTE] > Compilation does not occur until the first time the query is executed.
